CustomField.description: [RO-1143] Combines record type and segment information and displays "Agency" for record type "Agency Customer Business", "Agency Business" for "Agency Business" and "Segment Opp V02" value otherwise. Used for segregating Agency and Non-Agency Business in reporting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Combines record type and segment information and displays "Agency" for record type "Agency Customer Business", "Agency Business" for "Agency Business" and "Segment Opp V02" value otherwise.
CustomField.label: Extended Segment (Segment/Agency)
